name: Strengthening Core Identity
description: Building an unshakable sense of self to resist external influence and identity erosion.

cards.title: Reinforcing Self-Concept Against PSN Attacks
cards.description: Strengthening your identity to remain unaffected by PSN-induced self-doubt.
bulletpoints: Documenting your core values ensures they are not overwritten by external pressure.
Maintaining independent thought prevents forced assimilation into PSN-driven narratives.
Revisiting personal achievements counters any manufactured inferiority complexes imposed by PSNs.
cards.summaryText: Write down your core values so external pressure can't overwrite them, guard independent thinking to block forced absorption into their narrative, and review your wins regularly to counter implanted inferiority.

cards.title: Boundary Enforcement and Psychological Sovereignty
cards.description: Establishing and maintaining personal boundaries against psychological invasions.
bulletpoints: Setting clear behavioral expectations forces manipulators to reveal themselves.
Enforcing disengagement when boundaries are violated denies PSNs control over your space.
Rejecting forced emotional labor prevents PSNs from draining your mental energy.
cards.summaryText: Set hard expectations that smoke out manipulators when they cross lines, walk away the moment boundaries break to deny them access, and refuse emotional labor they try to dump on you.

cards.title: Identity Resilience Against Social Engineering
cards.description: Maintaining authenticity despite attempts to reshape your beliefs and behaviors.
bulletpoints: Maintaining long-term awareness of manipulation tactics prevents gradual erosion of identity.
Fostering independent critical thinking blocks indoctrination attempts.
Avoiding the need for external validation ensures control over personal decision-making.
cards.summaryText: Stay alert to manipulation over the long haul to prevent slow identity erosion, cultivate independent thinking that stops indoctrination cold, and drop the need for outside approval to own your choices.
